tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Art_Gallery (gallery_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gallery_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE Artwork (artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), artist VARCHAR(255), price DECIMAL(10,2), gallery_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (gallery_id) REFERENCES Art_Gallery(gallery_id))
CREATE TABLE artists (artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, artist_name STRING, art_style STRING)
CREATE TABLE paintings (painting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, painting_title STRING, artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id))
CREATE TABLE galleries (gallery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, gallery_name STRING, location STRING) REFERENCES artists(artist_id))

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT NOT NULL,
    year_created INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artists(id)
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    museum_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (museum_id) REFERENCES museums(id)
);

CREATE TABLE art_collections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT NOT NULL,
    collection_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks(id)
);
